dct_title_s: Post route map of the states of California and Nevada
dct_description_sm: published by order of Postmaster General A.S. Burleson.
Includes list of counties in California and Nevada, and insets of the San Francisco Bay area and the Los Angeles region.
Also shows county boundaries, roads with distances, railroads with distances, steamship lines with distances and service frequencies, and rivers, creeks and lakes.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
